From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2024 Indian filmBhaiyya JiDirected byApoorv Singh KarkiWritten byApoorv Singh Karki Deepak KingraniProduced byManoj BajpayeeVinod Bhanushali Shabana RazaKamlesh BhanushaliShael OswalSamiksha OswalStarringManoj BajpayeeZoya HussainSuvinder VickyJatin GoswamiCinematographyArjun KukretiProductioncompaniesBhanushali Studios Limited SSO ProductionsDistributed byPen Marudhar Entertainment (Theatrical)Release date
24 May 2024 (2024-05-24)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Bhaiyaa Ji is an Indian Hindi-language action, thriller, drama film written by Apoorv Singh Karki, Deepak Kingrani and directed by Apoorv Singh Karki. Manoj Bajpayee plays the titular role in the movie.[1][2][3]


Cast[edit]
Manoj Bajpayee
Zoya Hussain
Jatin Goswami
Suvinder Vicky
Vipin Sharma
Production[edit]
The film was announced in August 2023.[4]
Principal photography commenced on 19 September 2023.[5][6]
This project is the second collaboration of Manoj Bajpayee and Apoorv Singh Karki after the Sirf Ek Bandaa Kaafi Hai movie.[7]

Filming[edit]
Bhaiyya Ji was shot in Uttar Pradesh.[8]

Casting[edit]
Manoj Bajpayee plays the titular role while Zoya Hussain plays the lead female role.[9]

Marketing[edit]
The official teaser was unveiled on 20 March 2024.[10][11]

Release[edit]
The film is set for a theatrical release on 24 May 2024.[12][13]
